name: EC Admin UI
description: Internal tooling application for Enhanced Content administration. Built with Ember.js, it provides administrative interfaces for EC management, destination configuration, and demo data generation. Connects to dandelion and brand-space backend services via GraphQL.

name: Enhanced Content
description: Salsify's module for creating mobile-responsive enhanced layouts and publishing content-refresh products to syndication partners. EC Admin UI provides internal tooling for managing Enhanced Content operations.

name: Dandelion
description: A backend service that EC Admin UI connects to for Enhanced Content administration. Provides GraphQL endpoints for admin operations. Part of the Enhanced Content infrastructure.

name: Brand Space
description: A backend service that EC Admin UI connects to via GraphQL. Part of the Enhanced Content infrastructure that works alongside dandelion to support EC administration workflows.

name: Commerce UI
description: The frontend client for commerce features. EC Admin UI can be deployed to staging with custom revisions by appending client_revision[commerce-ui] query parameter to URLs.

links.description: Referenced in EC Admin UI deployment docs

name: Habanero
description: Salsify's internal UI component library and design system. Used by EC Admin UI and other Salsify frontend applications for consistent styling and components.

links.description: Used as dependency in EC Admin UI
